txt.en: 'I may have been wrong about you after all. These others complain about the work they do for me, and it is only fear of my retribution that keeps them in line. But you have served me well, and without complaint.\n\n'I do not think you need a shadow any longer. You will stay in line or you will answer to Morflak; that will be guard enough!'
'You have nothing for me!'
Book 4, Chapter 21: Servants of Saruman

'I may have been wrong about you after all. These others complain about the work they do for me, and it is only fear of my retribution that keeps them in line. But you have served me well, and without complaint.\n\n'I do not think you need a shadow any longer. You will stay in line or you will answer to Morflak; that will be guard enough!'
'You have nothing for me!'

'Talk to my lackey and do the work that he gives you. If he's wandered away, rattle your shackles, and he'd better appear. If he doesn't, he'll answer to me!'

<rgb=#FF0000>If you need to resummon your Uruk Overseer, use the Shackles you now have within your inventory and he will appear.</rgb>
'Talk to my lackey and do the work he gives you. If he's wandered away, rattle your shackles, and he'd better appear. If he doesn't, he'll answer to me!'

Morflak has assigned one of his lackeys to keep an eye on you within the ring of Isengard and to give you work. If this Uruk-hai wanders off for some reason, rattling your shackles should make him come running.

Morflak has assigned one of his lackeys to keep an eye on you within the Ring of Isengard.

<rgb=#FF0000>If you need to resummon Morflak's Lackey, use the Shackles you now have within your inventory and he will appear.</rgb>

'We are all servants of Shark√ª here, but some of us are given more freedom than others. I am one of these, little [placeholder], and in return I help my friends.

'I have assigned one of my trusted lackeys to watch you while you do my work. If he lets you out of his sight, rattle your shackles to draw him near. If he does this too often he may find himself out of my favour, then out of a head...in that order!'

<rgb=#FF0000>If you need to resummon Morflak's Lackey, use the Shackles you now have within your inventory and he will appear.</rgb>
